mapper.sql: STOCK_CODE, CLASSIFY_CODE, WEIGHT, INCLU_DATE, DELETED_FLAG, ORIGIN_CODE, CREATED_DATE, LAST_UPD_DATE, MODIFICATION_NUM
mapper.insert: insert into GP_STOCK_CLASS_MAP (STOCK_CODE, CLASSIFY_CODE, WEIGHT, INCLU_DATE, DELETED_FLAG, ORIGIN_CODE, CREATED_DATE, LAST_UPD_DATE, MODIFICATION_NUM) values (#{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{incluDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{originCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

STOCK_CODE,
CLASSIFY_CODE,
WEIGHT,

DELETED_FLAG,

mapper.update:
update GP_STOCK_CLASS_MAP
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INCLU_DATE = #{incluDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DELETED_FLAG = #{deletedFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
ORIGIN_CODE = #{originCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPD_DATE = #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFICATION_NUM = #{modificationNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where STOCK_CODE = #{stockCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CLASSIFY_CODE = #{classifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update GP_STOCK_CLASS_MAP set DELETED_FLAG = '1', LAST_UPD_DATE = #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFICATION_NUM = MODIFICATION_NUM+1 where CLASSIFY_CODE = #{classifyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
